title: mailman.start
body:
<<if $spoken_to_mailman == 0>>
    LAMMY: hey GIRL, i haven't seen you before, i'm LAMMY
    LAMMY: i just got kicked out of my band so if you got one, i'm looking to join
    <<set $spoken_to_mailman to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $jock_started_quest == 1>>
    <<if $jock_ended_quest == 0>>
        LAMMY: JACQUES is looking for his SWERVEBIRD?
        LAMMY: sure, here it is.
        LAMMY: ♪ i'm never borrowing anything from him again ♪
    <<endif>>
    <<set $jock_ended_quest to 1>>
<<endif>>
<<if $mailman_talked_to_today is 1>>
    LAMMY: ♪ you're totally bothering me ♪
    LAMMY: ♪ come back tomorrow when i'm not busy ♪
    <<stop>>
<<else>>
    <<if $mailman_day is 0>>
        LAMMY: hey GIRL, i'm super bummed out since my band dropped me
        LAMMY: i need a lyric that's DARK and BROODING that rhymes with "SAD"
        [[♪ cats are totally rad ♪|mailman.wronglyric1]][[♪ i really hate you, dad ♪|mailman.wronglyric2]][[♪ don't kick me out of the band, BRAD ♪|mailman.rightlyric]]
    <<elseif $mailman_day is 1>>
        <<if $mailman_accept_quest is 0>>
            LAMMY: GIRL, i have a problem
            LAMMY: MAILMAN has my package and i can't wait for him to deliver it
            LAMMY: can you go bug MAILMAN for my package?
            [[♪good as done♪|mailman.acceptquest]][[♪get it yourself♪|mailman.declinequest]]
        <<else>>
            <<if $mailman_done_quest is 0>>
                LAMMY: ♪ MAILMAN has the object of my desire ♪
                LAMMY: ♪ get that package and find my love ♪
                LAMMY: ♪ those new strings will light my fire ♪
            <<stop>>
            <<else>>
                LAMMY: RAD!
                LAMMY: GIRL, i'm your number 1 fan!
                <<addlove CurrentTarget>>
                <<set $mailman_day to 2>>
                <<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>
            <<endif>>
        <<endif>>
    <<elseif $mailman_day is 2>>
        LAMMY: GIRL, i've got a song, i've got the strings but nobody to listen
        LAMMY: what do i do?
        [[ask jacques|mailman.askjock]][[i'll listen|mailman.askinside]]
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: mailman.wronglyric1
body:
LAMMY: ♪ why'd you have to make me so SAD ♪
LAMMY: ♪ cats are totally rad ♪
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: lame.
LAMMY: cya tomorrow, GIRL
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.rightlyric
body:
LAMMY: that lyric really speaks to my soul
LAMMY: ♪ why'd you have to make me so SAD ♪
LAMMY: ♪ don't kick me out of the band, BRAD ♪
LAMMY: wow this is great CONTENT
LAMMY: i can't wait to put this up on my 'tube
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: nice jamming, GIRL
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
<<set $mailman_day to 1>>
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

body:

LAMMY: ...

title: mailman.acceptquest
body:
LAMMY: ♪ thanks, GIRL ♪
LAMMY: ♪ bug MAILMAN, get me that package ♪
<<set $mailman_accept_quest to 1>>
<<set $mailman_done_quest to 1>>

title: mailman.declinequest
body:
LAMMY: ...
LAMMY: you need to learn how to sing
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.askjock
body:
LAMMY: that kid only cares about his muscles and his degree
LAMMY: just leave me alone
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.askinside
body:
LAMMY: really, GIRL?
LAMMY: but where will i play?
[[by the bridge|mailman.playbybridge]][[come inside|mailman.comeinside]]

title: mailman.playbybridge
body:
LAMMY: that rickety old thing?
LAMMY: nobody wants to go on that thing
LAMMY: maybe one day i'll find a place to play
<<set $mailman_talked_to_today to 1>>

title: mailman.comeinside
body:
LAMMY: GIRL, YEAH
LAMMY: we'll have a rockin' house party!
LAMMY: i want to party with you forever
<<set $mailman_acquired to 1>>
<<addlove CurrentTarget>>
